title: [GAMEPLAY] Heimerdinger 1 of 3 turrets remain active / shoots after Hourglass + Flash (not around)
body:
{{champion:74}} used {{item:3157}}  and right after {{summoner:4}}'ed away one of three turrets  (the closest turret near him) remained active even when {{champion:74}} went back to base.

Two noticeable glitches:
1. Animation - bullets kept shooting while recalled at base (not near turrets).
2. 1 of 3 turrets remained active throughout the entire time {{champion:74}} was at base (not in the area).  This was confirmed by going back to the turrets, 2 of three were inactive and 1 remained active.

replies.body: If one just lasted a few seconds longer than the others, he could have simply been recalling within range of that one.  If it remained active for most of his walk back, it's probably a bug.
I would agree, but he was out of range long ago.  The turret yellow circle indicator spun down and the turret was still "stuck" in the active position.
